question: Kumbh Fair finds the place in the representative list of intangible cultural heritage of humanity of UNESCO. The four widely recognised Kumbh fairs are held at 1- Haridwar, 2- Nasik, 3- Ujjain and 4- Allahabad. Which of the following is correct order of these places from east to west?
explanation: Kumbh mela is held on these places which are located on the banks of the rivers or the confluences. The location of the places are along the the Ganges (Ganga) at Haridwar, the confluence (Sangam) of the Ganges, the Yamuna and the invisible Saraswati at Allahabad; the Godavari at Nasik; and the Shipra at Ujjain.  The map below shows the location of these places.
